content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment in Magdeburg, let us focus solely on discussing the rental price at this moment. To begin negotiations, I propose an initial price of 1250 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too expensive for me. I am a student and I have a limited budget. How about 900 Euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed rental price of 900 Euros falls significantly below my initial expectation, potentially jeopardizing my investment returns.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. But I am willing to make up for the lower price in other ways. For instance, I am a responsible tenant. I will take good care of the apartment. I will also pay six months of rent in advance. How about 1000 Euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While your assurance of taking care of the property and advance rent payment is appreciated, the reduction from 1250 to 1000 Euros still falls short of my desired profit margin. Unfortunately, I don't want to continue the negotiation at this rate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I apologize for not making myself clear, Mister Schmidt. I am willing to pay 1100 Euros per month. I will also sign a two-year lease agreement. I will take good care of the apartment. I will pay the rent on time every month. I am a dependable tenant. I hope we can find common ground.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: After considering your revised offer of 1100 Euros per month, a two-year lease agreement, reliable rent payment, and your assurance of being a dependable tenant, I agree to the price of 1100 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
